name: Cross-Agent
description:
Made for the 2020 United Game Jam with the theme : "Two"

In this game you play as an special agent with dual personality,  switch between them to beat the levels and reach the cure.

When controlling the girl you can dash and double jump, when controlling the gun guy, you shoot.

Controls are: WASD or Arrows to walk, Mouse to aim, Mouse or Ctrl to shoot.
